@id.description: The unique identifier (handle) of the Mapping object

@type.description: The type of the object, in this case ods:DataMapping

ods:type.description: The DOI to the FDO type of the object

ods:status.description: The status of the Digital Object

schema:name.description: Name of the Mapping as provided by the user, https://schema.org/name
examples: Default Mapping for Herbarium of University of Coimbra (COI)

schema:description.description: Description of the Mapping as provided by the user, https://schema.org/description
examples: The default mapping for the Herbarium of the University of Coimbra (COI) to the Darwin Core standard.

schema:dateCreated.description: Timestamp of creation. Internally generated, https://schema.org/dateCreated

schema:dateModified.description: Timestamp of last modification. Internally generated, https://schema.org/dateModified

ods:DefaultMapping.description: A mapping object setting default values for ods terms. These default mappings will be set for each record in the dataset. Key is the ods term, value the default value to use

ods:FieldMapping.description: Setting an explicit mapping for an ods term to a term from the incoming dataset. Key is the ods term, value the incoming data standard term

ods:mappingDataStandard.description: Type of data standard we are mapping to

ods:TombstoneMetadata.description: Object containing the tombstone metadata of the object. Only present when ods:status is ods:Tombstone
